divs: sighting detailstwo reportings of same object. december 20, 2012, 6pm. driving south on davis from north tarrant parkway in north richland hills. a plane is flying in same direction on east side of davis. i look ahead and see a multi-colored sparkling object. it looked like a giant fireworks sparkler. it was flying somewhat low following the outline of the hills flying in a southerly direction. i took it for a helicopter at first except that it looked like a sparkler with all the lights. it took off at a high rate of speed as it reached davis near 820 and shot off south. december 22, 2012, 10:25pm my husband and i are traveling north on 121 toward the 121\820\183 split in hurst, texas, exiting north onto the davis exit. i see what looks like a helicopter sized object, and i initially thought it was a helicopter, until it flashed white forming a saucer shape, immediately went to a multi-colored sparkler of indeterminate shape, then white sparkles and it disappeared. this all happened very quickly. i took it for a helicopter because it was the size of a helicopter, but seemed to have more extra flashing lights then the ones normally seen around here so i watched it. it was flying just north of the highway split, flying east along 183 and disappeared.
Summary: I saw this on Dec 20, 2012 also. It looked like a helicopter, flashed white, sparkled multicolor, went to white and disappeared.
